com.facebook.buck.test.selectors

Class PatternTestSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.test.selectors.PatternTestSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestSelector

    public class PatternTestSelector
extends Object
implements TestSelector
    A TestDescription will match if this selector's class-part is a substring of the TestDescription's full class-name, or if this selector's class-name, when interpreted as a java.util.regex regular-expression, matches the TestDescription's full class-name. (The same rules apply for the method-name as well. If this selector's class-part or method-part are null, all class-names or method-names will match.)

    • Method Detail

      • buildFromSelectorString

        public static TestSelector buildFromSelectorString(String rawSelectorString)
        Build a PatternTestSelector from the given String. Selector strings should be of the form "[is-exclusive][class-part]#[method-part]". If "[is-exclusive]" is a "!" then this selector will exclude tests, otherwise it will include tests. If the class-part (or method-part) are omitted, then all classes or methods will match. Consequently "#" means "include everything" and "!#" means "exclude everything". If the selector string doesn't contain a "#" at all, it is interpreted as a class-part.
        Parameters:
        rawSelectorString - An unparsed selector string.
